document_data.caption: Calauth
document_data.mainbody: '''Calauth''' was a [[moon elven]] noble house of [[Arcorar]]. The house was long-forgotten by {{yearlink|241}}.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|111|6}}
document_data.History: The last member of House Calauth, [[Braerindra Calauth]], died in {{yearlink|-21}}.
